Class SubscriptionServiceUserDetailsAuthenticationProvider

  • java.lang.Object

    public class SubscriptionServiceUserDetailsAuthenticationProvider
extends org.springframework.security.authentication.dao.AbstractUserDetailsAuthenticationProvider
    Loads user details from the subscription service.
